title: Legendary High School Football Coach On Career: 'Athletics Is Just Like Life'
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block talks to Summerville, S.C., high school football coach John McKissick, who announced his retirement Tuesday after 63 years. He won 621 games and 10 state championships.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
